sentence: Helen of TroyHELE has been consistently making strategic acquisitions, especially in profitable categories, to boost its portfolio.
Recently, the company stepped into the outdoor and athletic category by acquiring Hydro Flask and all membership units of Steel Technology, LLC in a cash deal worth $210 million.
Hydro Flask is a manufacturer of high performance insulated hydration vessels popular among active lifestyle enthusiasts.
The product line-up of the brand complements Helen of Troy's Housewares segment and helps it to extend its reach to the Outdoor Athletic.
Based in Bend, OR, also known as the outdoor Mecca, Hydro Flask has become quite popular among outdoor enthusiasts with its stainless steel hydration products.
The acquisition of Hydro Flask is expected to be accretive to Helen of Troy's sales growth, gross margin, cash flow and earnings effective immediately.

Besides this, the company took over the Vicks Vaposteam business from the Procter & Gamble Company PG in Mar 2015 following the venture into vitamin supplements with the Healthy Directions buyout in 2014.Notably, the company's earnings beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate in third-quarter fiscal 2016 helped by new products and strategic takeovers.
Outdoor lifestyle market is expected to grow modestly and become more popular in 2016, as customers are increasingly resorting to athletic and active life.
Warmer climate are prompting people to spend more time out of doors, thus increasing the demand for Athleisure products.
Over the last few years, Active lifestyle category has been experiencing double-digit growth and Helen of Troy appears to have adopted the right strategy to tap into this trend.
Helen of Troy currently carries a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
Another stock in the consumer discretionary sector worth considering is Francesca's Holdings FRAN and Coty Inc. COTY with the same Zacks Rank as Helen of Troy.
